title: Account hacked, whomever did is spent 200$ on RP, changed region cannot log onto account.
body:
This is another account of mine, my main account I haven't played on it as much since I have already hit gold on it. 

Got two emails last night from Riot being the receipts you get after purchasing RP, I usually only purchase 10-20 dollars worth at a time, but this time I had 2 emails saying my I spent 100 on RP. I put in a ticket, but I cannot edit it any further since it don't have access to the account, I changed my password, but even when i try and log it and says the "email, password, or region  cannot verify my account" regardless of password change I still can't access that account, and it's a little unsafe that riot has the email verification where you don't have to enter the 3 digits on the back for this reason. 

and im a little upset that there isn't any phone support to speed up this process, when you live paycheck to paycheck and then 200 is just missing, Its such a shitty feeling. 

Anyone had a problems like this and are able to share some insight?

replies.body: If the account is the one you're posting from, I was unable to find a ticket.  You can send us a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) without having to login to the account.  Alternatively, an email to support@riotgames.com works too.  You can reply to the email to correspond with us without having to login to the ticket center.  Our account team can help you out individually with recovering the account as well as reparations.  We'll respond as soon as possible, and you'll be in good hands!
